statements: SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, gender, phone_number FROM Patients;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Patients;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT name, appointment_date FROM Patients WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM Patients;
SELECT MIN(age) AS min_age, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender, COUNT(*) AS total FROM Patients GROUP BY gender;
SELECT gender, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM Patients GROUP BY gender;
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(appointment_date) AS appointment_year FROM Patients;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%Allergy%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age >= 18 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY appointment_date;
SELECT name, email FROM Patients WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT medical_history) AS total_medical_histories FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_purpose FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time >= '10:00:00';
SELECT appointments.appointment_id, patients.patient_name FROM appointments INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT appointments.appointment_id, patients.patient_name, appointments.appointment_date FROM appointments INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id;

SELECT appointments.appointment_id, patients.patient_name, appointments.appointment_date, patients.age FROM appointments INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE patients.age > 40;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(appointment_id) AS num_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(appointment_id) AS num_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY doctor_name;
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_purpose, COUNT(appointment_id) AS num_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY doctor_name, appointment_purpose;
SELECT gender, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM patients GROUP BY gender;
SELECT DISTINCT doctor_name FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
